website_summaries.verdict: A colourful three-ring pool small enough for a supervised little one of one to three years. A simple budget buy.
pros: Easy to set up in the backyard
The bottom can also be inflated to enhance comfort
cons: It's really not big enough to fit more than one child comfortably

customer_reviews.title: Handy little pool
customer_reviews.text: This little pool is a good size for our 1-year-old. We use it as a play pen when we're in the yard and also as a wading pool with a little bit of water and a few toys. We've even used it as a little bed when our son fell asleep at a beach party. Its petite size makes it easy to pack in a bag and it blows up in little time. It's also durable as we've used it many times with no leaks or tears so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jheneya

customer_reviews.title: Has held up nicely
customer_reviews.text: So this pool is cheap... but has actually held up pretty well this summer... I bought this to bring to the beach with us so my daughter, who is two, could swim in it sometimes instead of the ocean. We have brought this to the ocean filled it with water and dragged it back successfully many times without ripping or tearing it. My husband also used it as some kind of a surfing or floating device in the ocean and it didn't pop... Surprisingly. Nice little pool... Cheap price... Can't go wrong
customer_reviews.author: Lisa DTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: $6 Well Spent
customer_reviews.text: The top ring doesn't blow up to a perfect circle, but it's not bothering my daughter so it's all good. It's cushioned on the bottom, which is nice. It's pretty wide, not too deep. We use it as a ball pit. In the picture we have about 100 balls in there, plus two of my daughters favorite stuffed animals. Everything fits nicely, it's nice addition to her play space. Worth the 6$.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Inflatable Playpen!
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than the picture. Very nice, works like a playpen. Not planning to put much water in it, just enough to get my baby a little wet maybe. He is 5 months in the picture. Note that we pumped it with a tire pump. That's why it is so fully inflated.
customer_reviews.author: Puppy's Mama

customer_reviews.title: Ordered the pool twice, both times came with a puncture and would not blow up fully
customer_reviews.text: Am very disappointed - love the pool and it's the perfect size and look. Sadly, I ordered the pool and it arrived with a puncture so I had to send it back. I ordered another one and the second one also came with a puncture! Tried the puncture repair stickers both times that are included in the box and neither of them would stick to it properly and repair the puncture. Keeps deflating. So disappointing. So I've had to send the second one back too.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small toddler.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect pool for my 13 month old. Fits great on my townhome balcony still leaving room for patio chairs and her water table. Arrived In great condition and on the day amazon said it would arrive. I removed 1 star because the plug that you close after putting air in the bottom of the pool doesn't push back in to the plastic like it does on the sides so I'm going to guess she will find it sooner or later and deflate the bottom section. But it's not that big of a deal. Still very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Krg52985

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Good price for a nice small kiddie pool. We use it mainly for our 8mo old granddaughter (she's 9mo now) mainly indoor without water to play in. I blew it up orally and it will give you a little bit of a workout if you want to do it that way. I use my small compressor now to re-inflate. We also used another very cheap kids inner tube (I think it was less than 2 bucks) inflate it about 3/4 and just insert it into the pool (fits snugly) and she plays well that way also. Put it outside last week with a few inches of water and she had a blast.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S.

customer_reviews.title: Great pool for my one year old
customer_reviews.text: My one year old son loves playing in this pool. It was very easy to inflate, however, it's not super sturdy on the sides - when he tries to stand up while holding onto the sides, it sinks down (even when all the way inflated). This could potentially be dangerous, however we always supervise him. Very easy to inflate and deflate. We've been using this on our porch and plan to bring it on our beach vacation next week. No complaints especially for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Great pool, for 10 dollars...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little pool, our 1 year old and 3 year old love it. We bought one summer 2019 for 10 dollars, which felt like an appropriate price for what it is. Our kids were pretty wild with the pool and caused a hole in it, so we bought a new one about a month ago. We then paid 14 dollars. Now all of a sudden it’s 20 dollars?! A 100% increase in price over a year, when the product is the exact same is absurd. Again, great little pool, but as of now the price point does not match the quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun times
customer_reviews.text: I used this pool for a baby playdate. We had three babies in the pool age 5 months to 9 months and it worked well. I plan to use this pool indoors with little plastic balls. I also will continue using it outdoors and fill it with water for the little one to play in. I really like how the bottom of the pool is cushioned so regardless of the surface the post setting on it'll be a layer of cushion under your baby. I think it's sturdy enough for dogs as well. *if you find this review at all helpful, please click the HELPFUL button below as it motivates me for future product reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W-P

customer_reviews.title: Awesome baby pool, need!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my almost 6 month old who already sits by herself. And I loved it!! Its super easy to inflate with your mouth lol and it's super sturdy I only put water to the green part and my 18+lb baby didn't knock it over when she layed on the side. We will definitely use it during fall as well in her room with some plastic balls. Or to keep her put so she isn't moving around the house. Must need in my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: Genesis Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Very very very small! Should have gone next size up.
customer_reviews.text: This is soooooo small, I should remove another star, but I guess I didn’t really think about the size. Not sure if I am the only one but I struggled to blow up the blue bottom section. The reason for the 1 star deduction. I had expected small, but rather than think about the measurements I kind of went off the pictures of kids in it. Bad decision. My daughter can’t even bring more than a toy or two into the water with her without the pool basically being crowded. It’s my fault but I regret my order. I really wish I had gone to the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: AimarooniTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Id get it again
customer_reviews.text: Great love it and so does my daughter. We have a walk in shower in my master bathroom and she likes to take a bath while i shower so i got her this to go in the shower with me. Its perfect size for her to play around and not so deep like a bath tub. She loves it and wants to get in it every day. So it has helped with my angel of a 2 year old love taking a bath. She thinks of ot more as swimming now lol. So easy way to trick your tiny creations how to enjoy bath time.
customer_reviews.author: Yomi rose

customer_reviews.title: Such a useful pool!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our grandson as a first pool. He loved it! Then it wasn't used as he could crawl right out of it and into trouble. So we moved him to our 12 ft above ground pool in a floaty. It sat for a bit, then one day I brought it inside, put blankets in it and his best toy, and it is now his cozy coze nap station. He loves it!!! Don't know what it will be used for next, but it is a handy little pool!!! And yes, it's great on concrete and also hardwood floors with that extra bottom cushion!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for holding a beer keg tub
customer_reviews.text: I have an annual party (indoors) where I get a 1/2 keg of beer. I put the beer in a tub of ice. But the tub "sweats" from all the condensation making a puddle on the floor, or soaking the carpet. I bought this to set the the tub in. It works perfectly for that! The tub fits fine and all that condensation is caught in the pool. I usually end up with an inch of water in the pool. I highly recommend. I have no idea if it works well as a kid's pool, I've never used it for that.
customer_reviews.author: fredact

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size pool for a toddler!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my toddler. We use it in the yard and at the beach (she isn’t a fan of the ocean yet!). The bottom inflates which makes a soft seat for my baby, but it’s also a little hard to balance on for her (which isn’t a big deal for us). I haven’t had issues with durability at all, so I imagine those who have had problem may have just gotten a bad on out of the batch. If this pops I’ll be buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin O.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 months old can't stop staring at it. She loves it! The colors are bright and I also love that the bottom part is also inflatable. Definitely even more comfortable for the baby. We put it earlier in the morning, by the time we use it the water was completely warm. Make sure you have a step stool where you can sit on it to supervise otherwise you'll be a little uncomfortable unless you don't mind sitting on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Manchego

customer_reviews.title: Not worth purchasing
customer_reviews.text: This product is not great. My expectations were mid-grade to start with but this has just been disappointing. The pool does NOT fully inflate like the advertised pictures in the listing. We tried a bike pump first, then went to Big5 to purchase an INTEX brand pump because we thought that was the issue. Nope. Just a poorly manufactured product. I'm keeping it because I just need it for "messy" toddler play indoors, so it doesn't need to be perfect. However, I definitely would not choose and purchase this pool again if I was looking for a small inflatable pool.
customer_reviews.author: K. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby on the beach!
customer_reviews.text: We brought this to the beach for our 8-month old who wasn’t quite crawling yet. It was great for her to hang out in with just a little sea water added and under our tent. Kept her from eating the sand and getting sand everywhere. We’ll trying using it again this month - she’s 11 months now and quite a crawler - so we’ll see if it does anything to contain her any more. It’s super compact and easy to bring to the beach for the day, deflate and bring home, rinse and repeat.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Beacham

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 out of 5 because the bottom keeps deflating. And it does so pretty quickly. I bought it mainly to use as a ball pit. Will eventually try it out withwater but have not yet. It’s cute and overall it serves its purpose. Bummed about the bottom deflating but I still like it. I would probably purchase again but would not pay anymore than what I paid this time. There are 200 balls in it in the photo but they are very small ones. Larger ones would probably fill it up better but my daughter can hold these ones. She’s 11 months and fits in this pool perfectly with some stuffed animals and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Vacation!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take with us on vacation for the beach. It worked perfect. Great price for what I needed it for. My 14month old LOVED playing in this pool that we filled with ocean water and beach toys. We inflated it and just kept it inflated for each beach day. It also doubled as a tub at night, as our condo only had a shower (and my little guy, HATES showers) I highly recommend this product for beach/ vacation use. Not sure how long it will hold up, but for the price I can't complain, it did it's job. Plus, it was light weight enough that it was easily packed in our luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Even if you lay a tarp down under this, my daughter could feel every Pebble through the bottom and managed to pop the floor portion first. The sides wouldn't stay inflated through the night even when I tried to find every last hole, there were none. Honest waste of money but my daughter still enjoyed it while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Demi

customer_reviews.title: Great when used inside. Did not work as a pool
customer_reviews.text: I had high hops for the pool. At first we were using it inside the house as a play area for the baby. It provided the perfect cushion for her when she would fall since she was just learning to sit up. Last week we took the pool outside to use as is intended and after the first use the bottom part got a hole. The whole bottom part of the pool can not inflate and we aren’t even sure how it was punctured. Now the pool doesn’t have the same structure. If you plan on using this pool inside, it works fine but be warned that can easily get a hole.
customer_reviews.author: yazmin zavala

customer_reviews.title: Holds air for days
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it's the nature of these pools but usually they don't hold air. Well, this one has been amazing. Initially, it was used indoors as an additional play pen within the play area. It was used like that for a week plus and held up very well. I brought it outside to use as a pool and didn't have to add air at all. The cushion like floor is a nice touch. It's a bit small but just right for one child and toys.
customer_reviews.author: ZODC

customer_reviews.title: NEW ONE IS THE CHARM
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this for my grand-daughter to play "pool & beaches" with her dolls. The first one had a pin-prick and I couldn't fix it so I purchased this one. I didn't return it because it was less than $10 and for me not worth the trouble. I purchased a new one and this one is perfect She's so happy with it and is having loads of fun with it on my terrace with her babies.
customer_reviews.author: BDJ

customer_reviews.title: Small but perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect to keep my 1yr old busy!! I don't use it as an actual pool, but a mini ball pit. He loves it!! And my 4yr old niece loves it just as much!! I used the hand pump that came w my yoga ball and it filled in abt 5 mins. You do have to pump each ring separately but it's so small it doesn't take much energy. I was going to return it bc I'd purchased it for his 1st birthday and never used it... but we moved and this was perfect for him to play in while we unpacked/cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: KimH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Beach or Apt adeck
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little pool to lug down to the beach if you have a little toddler. If you are already carrying beach toys and chairs on every limb of your body, might as well figure out how to get this down! It entertained my 1 year old and got him to stay close rather than wondering with the older kids down to the water!! This would also be great to entertain a small toddler in on a small deck of an apartment or condo!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Padded bottom is great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my city patio, plus I love that it has a padded bottom for my little one (and no obnoxious cartoon characters). She loves it so much that she popped the top ring by leaning (aggressively and repeatedly) against it. I wish it had lasted more than a few uses, but I still plan to purchase the same one again.
customer_reviews.author: Girl in Japan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Girlfriend used this specifically for her product photography assignments and it worked out. Comes as advertised. Each layer have to inflate, so by hand or mouth, it will take time. Highly suggest getting a plug in pump to inflate it at a faster rate. Lol, girlfriend didnt have any pump so she inflated by mouth, no a good idea. If anyone does, your head will be spinning and be out of breath. What takes the longest is the bottom layer since it has all those individual pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Lee Rice

customer_reviews.title: Disatisfied buyer
customer_reviews.text: I received the damaged product. I discovered there is a tiny hole in the top outer layer at the bottom tube. First I thought it is just hard to put air by using mouth but I later discovered the tiny hole when using the air pump. I contacted the seller but they offered no help simply saying the contact the manufacturer without any detail information. Now they don't even respond to me. It was really horrible experience dealing with this seller. I regret getting this now.
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT CHUNG

customer_reviews.title: A bit difficult to inflate
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year-old granddaughter loves this great little splash pool when she comes to visit. I did find it a bit difficult to inflate (since I had to do it by blowing air from my mouth into it). The bottom of the pool, although also filled with channels of air, is not cushy... So I put a towel underneath it since it sits on my hard, stone patio. A fine purchase, I don't know how long it will last, but even if it's for one summer, that's okay. It's inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Y.

customer_reviews.title: Must have for babies at the beach
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use at the beach and it’s the best $10 we’ve spent this summer! Our little girl LOVED playing in here while we were at the beach. She was cool, entertained, and (most importantly) contained. It’s small enough that you can fold it in half and easily carry it, yet big enough to hold two toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Filled It With Ice!
customer_reviews.text: We had a picnic for about 40 people on a hot summer day. We filled this with ice and placed all of the bowls of temperature-sensitive foods in it to keep them safe. As the sun shifted, we just kept sliding the pool back into the shade of the gazebo and everything stayed fresh. We might buy another next year to give us extra room for more foods.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie Writes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pool for 6 Month Old
customer_reviews.text: My almost 6 month old daughter is sitting well and we have used this almost every day since it arrived. I put about 3-4 inches of water in it and she loves splashing around. She also plays on her belly and kicks around. I have even dumped the water out and taken it places with us and put a blanket down so she can sit in there with toys --- it's like a little playpen. This was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia B. Sperling

customer_reviews.title: Great kids "bathtub"
customer_reviews.text: Since we lived in a small apartment with only a standing shower, I was trying to figure out how to do bathtime for my lil' guy. I saw this inflatable pool recommended on some random thread by another parent that had the same issue. Turns out is was perfect for our purposes. Not too big; it fit inside the tiled shower just fine. This pool lasted through plenty of use from age 2.5 through 4.5!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Claire

customer_reviews.title: PLEASED
customer_reviews.text: Used this pool when pulling the engine from my 69 Chevelle. I inflated it and slid it under the engine and transmission top catch all the vehicle fluids that drain out when pulling the engine and transmission. The construction allowed me to lift the pool and pour the fluids into a five gallon bucket for disposal. After used for it's intent, deflate and toss in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Windy Bettis

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a ball pit for my toddlers at work. They’ve had it for almost a year now and it’s holding up great. They play in it 5 days a week. They’re not gentle with it at all. The bottom never stays inflated but that’s fine with me and the kids don’t seem to mind. I don’t think there’s a hole in the bottom I think it’s from them bouncing around in it. If I blow the bottom up on Friday it’s good till Monday and flat by Tuesday.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Great little pool!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little pool for my 11 month old grand daughter. It is easy to blow up, in just minutes (I'm 66), and it is the perfect size for keeping track of her as she plays in it. (I can reach across the width of it......she is never out of arms reach). I only put 4 gallons of water in it....enough to play, but not too deep. It is perfect for these hot humid summer afternoons. I did not inflate the bottom part.....it didn't seem necessary. SO glad I purchased it for her.
customer_reviews.author: hair brush

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than it looks
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small inflatable pool for a kid’s game. I read the size in the description, but it’s still much bigger than I thought it would be. Apparently the little girl in the picture isn’t that little. Takes a while to inflate because each color is inflated separately. But it’s very durable. And the colors are nice and bright.
customer_reviews.author: Add2Cart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I got this after my son kept seeing my landlords grandchildren come over and go into their pool. He’s far too strict for me to be able to put one out of my own so I wanted to find a small pool that was still big enough for my son to fit in. This worked really well for us and my son loved it the moment I blew it up! Glad i bought this product; my daughter loved it too!
customer_reviews.author: Gaby Garcia-Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Small baby pool is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The small inflatable pool is what I expected for the money. It's made by Intex which manufactures a whole line of inflatable products like beds & above-ground pools. Their inflatable beds are very good and I've bought several of them over the years, so I expect this particular product to be of acceptable quality for the small cost.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a great purchase. We use it as a baby pool and a ball pit. I wish I had bought it a lot earlier and used it as a safe play area for my baby before he was able to sit well. I didn’t find it easy to inflate. Used an air compressor. Otherwise would have taken me a long time. However, it’s not an issue that alters my love for this product. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: PLUR

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Perfect Size for Toddler
customer_reviews.text: This pool is the perfect size for our very active 16-month-old grandson. We place it on top of exercise mats on our patio for padding and protection, and it has withstood all the busy play and climbing in and out that our grandson has dished out. He will probably need a larger pool next summer, but this was perfect for now.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Baby at the Beach
customer_reviews.text: We took our baby to the beach and loved this little pool. Inflated, filled with water to a height we were comfortable with, and didn't have to worry about him wandering in the lake. He enjoyed sand, water, and sun without having to go too far! Packed up in the summer stuff and can't wait to use again next year!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Makeshift "Bathtub"
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and perfect for what we bought it for! We live full time in a camper and needed this to have a "bathtub" for our 2 year old. Its comfy with the inflatable padding on the bottom and tall on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Tharp

customer_reviews.title: Air tubes sealed shut
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult to inflate because the 4 tubes intended to receive the air were sealed shut at the bottom. I had to use an awl to puncture them (very carefully, without puncturing the pool itself) in order for the air to go in. Also had to buy a bicycle pump. No way anyone could blow it up themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Pool
customer_reviews.text: The company is a great company to work with. Probably the most responsive with answering questions that I have experienced with Amazon. The pool is big and exactly what I was looking for. Great for a party of children or a few adults. We used an air pump but have since acquired a pool hand pump. It was not expensive and works really well for other blow up items and I'm sure it would work well for the large pool when we need to pump it up again.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Go with a plastic pool.
customer_reviews.text: Sprung a leak after first use. Very disappointed because my return window closed as I bough it before we could actually pull it out and use it. Not a happy customer ☹️
customer_reviews.author: April Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Second time I've purchased this pool. Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've purchased this little baby pool. We use it as a ball pit for our 10 month old. Our first one lasted about four months before getting a hole in it somehow. For 10 bucks though, I'd say that's not too bad. Would purchase again. Love the colors and great size for a little one.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Small compact and perfectly sized for infant or toddler!
customer_reviews.text: Used to allow my son to play on the beach under an umbrella and it was PERFECT. Very easy to blow up in a matter of minutes and easy to deflate as well to pack up. I liked the height after blown up which was enough to allow my 9 month old to sit up against the sides and still have support for the water. I liked the blown up ridge bottom allowing for comfort while my baby played in it. This was a great, cheap remedy to help this momma keep her son occupied. Great little pool!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Evans

customer_reviews.title: My 7 month old grandson loves his pool!
customer_reviews.text: Small. Just the right size for the under 1 yr old crowd. The bottom is puffy, so soft on baby's bottom. The sides are sturdy. Room for the little one's favorite water toys. We used a pump to inflate it, as each ring requires inflating individually. Great for my grandson's first pool!!
customer_reviews.author: mamunro

customer_reviews.title: Excellent doggie shower but needs an adapter for outdoor water spigot
customer_reviews.text: This doggie shower makes it so much easier especially for timid dogs. The flow is controllable so the dog does not panic with the sound of rushing water. I have 2 Pomeranians and they are not fighting to get away when we use this hand held shower washer. But I did have to buy this adapter which replaces the cone shaped piece that comes with the shower. For some reason the threads dont line up and it would not fit on any of our 4 outdoor water spigots. With the adapter it works perfect
customer_reviews.author: michelle helm

customer_reviews.title: Great pool! Multi purpose use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a ballpit for my daughter and it is absolutely perfect! We can take all the balls out and throw her toys in there for a soft contained place for her to play and I cant wait to use it in the summer with water. We got ours 4 months ago and I haven't had to refill it with air once! It has held up alot better then I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Waynebeck

customer_reviews.title: Not round shaped when inflated. Average quality.
customer_reviews.text: This was not the easiest item to inflate. And it was not round once we had it fully inflated. It has a pentagon (5-sided) shape, which doesn't look that great. The bottom portion does not inflate to nearly the cushy level pictured on the item's box. This item doesn't feel all that durable either.
customer_reviews.author: Marie33kl

customer_reviews.title: Great kiddie pool
customer_reviews.text: The pool is just the right size for my 8 mo. old. She has just enough space for toys. I like how the floor is inflatable also creating a cushion for tile floors. I don't recommend it for dirt or grass unless you put a plastic or fabric underneath to avoid creating any pinholes. It's not to tall, which makes it safe for the infant no to have to much water. It came with a cute DIY lifeguard id. It's a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Is almost exactly as the picture, well made and packed, the only difference it’s not shown in picture is that warnings are all over the yellow color, I didn’t like it but still making its function, I bough this size so I can put it at my balcony, my baby is 12 months old just for 1 baby at time
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Great little pool!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two granddaughters aged 4 & 5 just to use at the beach. They both sat in it and played together making our time at the beach so much more enjoyable. We just rinsed it off in the ocean and it was good to go for the next day. It’s very durable. We loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kyann

customer_reviews.title: Fun tiny pool.
customer_reviews.text: The pool was a lot smaller then I was expecting but that's on me. It was bought for my 18 month grandson so it actually worked out ok. It's a good introduction to water size for him. I didn't give it a 5 star for durability because it's inflatable and of coarse will eventually get a hole. I am however very happy with it for what I paid for it and it did meet my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Trudeau

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Pool For A Baby
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for use at granny's house this past summer for my little 6 month old granddaughter who had just learned to sit up by herself. The pool is easy to blow up and very cushy and comfortable, even on the bottom. I want a larger one for ME!! It was easy to clean and deflate for next year. The bright colors are adorable. The baby had a ball splashing and playing.
customer_reviews.author: SusanTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a ball pit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 16 month old to use as a ball pit. We had went through 3 different styles of ballpits in a month. This one seems to be the best so far. And a really great price! Not too big and not too small. Perfect for my so. To play in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for VERY young children
customer_reviews.text: I use this for a 9 month old baby and it's perfect!. I love the inflated, cushioned bottom of the pool. This pool is small enough to keep the baby from flailing all over the place, yet large enough for the child to move around while staying in arms' reach of the supervising adult.
customer_reviews.author: penname

customer_reviews.title: Must have for all types of activities
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandbabies for a family reunion. Perfect for napping, water play, sand, snow, and even bathtime. Perfect size to be used indoors for a variety of activities. The possibilities are endless. Must have for parents. The sky is the limit on the uses.
customer_reviews.author: ChaddersLadyV

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little pool!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not using it as a pool for a child, but to shower my elderly father. Works perfectly for that application. I purchased an electric pump to make it easier to inflate, but it's not necessary. I'm positive it would be a perfect little pool for a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Mirtha A.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pool because I thought it would be perfect to bring to the beach for my toddler son. I was very excited for this product to arrive, but when it did get here, it was not a baby pool at all. Instead, I am stuck with a raft that I don't want. Very disappointing as the appeal to ordering an item on Amazon is that it is hassle free. Who wants to spend extra time to return a product and get the right one when the whole point is to save time. On a side note, I found this baby pool at shoprite and it was even cheaper there. I love the actual pool!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Makaro

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Baby Bath Tub
customer_reviews.text: We just got back from a 3 week camping trip with our 15-month old twins. We knew bathing them was going to be tricky, but didn't want to carry something that would take up a lot of room. This pool really is tiny, but the plastic is very sturdy and didn't take much water to fill. This took up very little room when it was collapsed, but provided more than enough room for two babies to splash around during bath time or any time it got hot.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on our second floor apartment patio. It’s a nice size for my toddler to play in and it fits very well on the patio. I had a bit of trouble blowing it up because I don’t have any electric pump so I used a manual one. Still a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small kids/babies at the beach.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the little kids at the beach. That’s why I bought it. I like that the bottom Inflates so the bottom is soft on the hard sand. The baby can sit and splash. When you’re done dump the water toss in the toys load up and ride up out. Easy peasy.
customer_reviews.author: Leeleeinjax

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Kiddie Pool
customer_reviews.text: Love this pool, perfect size for 1 or two toddlers. My daughter climbs in and out with ease. We used a bike pump to blow it up. It's still completely inflated a week later. I could have bought it cheaper at a Walmart or Big Lots, but Amazon was easier.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth C

customer_reviews.title: Didn't stand the "Toddler Test"
customer_reviews.text: It didn't stand the toddler test and a few parts of it won't stay inflated anymore. The bottom inflates separately from the sides and the sides have 2 different separate spouts. I used it as a ball pit. Maybe it would last longer just as a pool🤔
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Deppen

customer_reviews.title: Good small inflateable pool for kids
customer_reviews.text: We bought this knowing we would be using it on our balcony since the pool is closed due to the plandemic. Great little pool, easy to inflate, our 6 year old played in it and enjoyed it although it was small and more suitable for toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect even for just a little play pin for my 6 month old. That's what it's mostly used for. When we're sitting around in the living room, he's in the pool playing with his toys. We put water in it once to let him splash around outside, but it's just been too hot even for that.
customer_reviews.author: Kayli

customer_reviews.title: Good but had a small hole.
customer_reviews.text: Good but the bottom part had two holes in it when we first got it. It comes with one patch so we were able to patch one but there is still a small other one. Still useable though and my son loves it. Perfect size for the front porch of our townhome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pool with a hole in it.
customer_reviews.text: It popped at the last minute when i was almost done inflating it. If you decide this item try to inflate it asap, as I waited a month to do it because it wasn't hot enough yet and now I'm stuck with this POS pool with a hole in it. Very annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: kmet

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get to use it because the air never stayed ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get to use it because the air never stayed in it. I'd air it up and within an hour it was flat
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great ball pit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a swimming pool and a ball pit for my 17-month old kiddo. We haven’t used it as a pool yet. It works great as a ball pit. My kiddo is able to get in and out with ease. I have 200 balls in there, which I bought from Amazon as well (the 100 balls per bag and are slightly smaller than the typical ones). It easily stores under my kiddo’s crib. It was also easy to blow up - I didn’t use a pump and took less than 5 minutes. True to size as mentioned in the description. Hope this review serves of any help! :)
customer_reviews.author: Frida

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Fun
customer_reviews.text: We used these as bases for a water kickball game and they held up really well. They were the perfect size and handled some rough play. The bottoms did pop eventually (which was no surprise given that people were running and jumping in them), but they still held water and lasted fantastically.
customer_reviews.author: Melreview

customer_reviews.title: Good for a young baby
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pool. My son is eight months old and enjoys it. It is small enough though that he can reach out the sides and reach for the grass, but not too small to splash around in. It took me 20 minutes to blow up, but it seems pretty sturdy. Glad I got it!
customer_reviews.author: Jrobert

customer_reviews.title: Great kids pool
customer_reviews.text: Great easy to inflate pool for kids. It was inflated by mouth in less than 5 minutes, 3 different rings to inflate. And some cushion on the bottom. I used it at the beach and in the grass, both places it worked perfect. 1
customer_reviews.author: Leli

customer_reviews.title: Basic. Reliable. Cheap.
customer_reviews.text: It's a basic inflatable baby pool. The colors match that of the photo and packaging was great as well. Been using this pool daily for our 1 year old all summer long. Bonus for the inflatable floor to cushion her baby buns since we set the pool in the shade on the back porch.
customer_reviews.author: Unruly_CurlyMe

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my ducks. What's a duck without water, right? I didn't fill up the top ring because they're still young and ducks don't jump very well. My husband was worried about them poking a hole in it. Hasn't been an issue. Even with my chickens messing with it. Easy to empty and clean too.
customer_reviews.author: Moffett Family

customer_reviews.title: cusion bottom blow up
customer_reviews.text: Great pool. Perfect size. Not too big. Enough for one and easy to keep eye on. Bottom is double layered and inflates for cusion. Three rings each blow up and have their own spout. Nicely made. Sturdy. I recomend.
customer_reviews.author: angelina

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like it too much
customer_reviews.text: This product was suitable for my girl, however it is not easy to inflate even using a pump with the appropriate accessories it does not inflate as shown in the photo and the floor is flimsy so I do not recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Paola

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for city sidewalk pool parties
customer_reviews.text: We live in the city and got this for streetside pool parties. It's held up on concrete with multiple kids climbing in and out. It's perfect for our 1 year old and 5 year old. I love that the bottom has an inflatable cushion so they aren't sitting right on the concrete.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Toddler/baby liked it, filled with water and/or balls, used in a playpen
customer_reviews.text: We ended up using it inside a play pen, filled with play balls. Baby/toddler liked it very much. Kept leaning over the edges and enjoyed hopping on and off. Also filled it with water. Baby/toddler enjoyed playing in it. Started using it at 9 months and it was fun and seems stable and safe. Bear in mind every ring is blown separately, the floor separate too. I like that in case one looses air, still it stays up. Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Great little pool!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a couple years ago and my great nieces still use it (4 and 1). It's hot where I live and even though they're getting bigger they still play in it - together! Perfect for babies to preschool ages. Very sturdy and easy to get the water out. My niece bought the larger size and they love it! Kids can lay down and 'swim'.
customer_reviews.author: Jill P

customer_reviews.title: Summer must have
customer_reviews.text: With a toddler, I decided it was time for an inflatable pool. There is so many uses for this particular pool. We have it inflated all the time! As it serves as a pin ball pool. Then, as a pool during those hot days.
customer_reviews.author: betzy cuellar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little kiddy pool
customer_reviews.text: It’s the perfect kiddy pool if you’re looking for a smaller pool with really good bottom padding especially if you’re placing this pool on a hard surface like a deck or if you’ve got a jumpy toddler who loves to bounce as they splash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prefect size
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this pool for our 1 1/2 year old. It is a great size for her and she loves playing in it. It’s easy to inflate and with over a month of use it’s still like new - no leaks. We also took it with us to the beach and set it up in the sand for her to play in. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: P. Isner

customer_reviews.title: So many uses
customer_reviews.text: I got so much use out of this. Indoors we filled wit our grand daughters toys. Outdoors, she LOVED playing in the water this summer. I didn’t expect this to be such high quality, but it was. So perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Mcginn

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun for tiny ones!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 4 month old’s first swim! The padded bottom is great, made it comfortable for her to sit on. Stood up to the ground covered in wood chips. I had a hard time blowing it up, but my husband said it wasn’t so bad. Didn’t use a pump, just our own lungs. It’s very small- I can fit in there cross-legged but I’ve got short legs. You should buy this. Lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin E. Stuhan

customer_reviews.title: Great little pool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little pool to quickly set up in the backyard for some splashing fun! My 6.5 month old loves it! Pay attention to the dimensions, it is a little small but it's what I was looking for and it works great for us! Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Bcat20Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars - Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take to the beach with my 18 month old daughter. We didn't end up using it but did blow it up to use during the summer. It was the perfect size for just her to play in by herself. And despite being quite rough on the pool itself it didn't get any holes or deflate even after months of use and exposure to the elements. Looking forward to using it with my son this summer (he will be 7-9 months old this summer).
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I guess I thought 34 inches would be bigger! Cute little pool that my granddaughter enjoyed splashing around in - really easy to inflate and pretty durable as well. Just wish it were a little bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Calhitex

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, no air leakage
customer_reviews.text: This pool is the perfect size to dip my feet in on a hot after doing yard work. It’s a perk that it is padded at the bottom. It was easy to inflate and didn’t have any issues with air leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Sprklindiamond

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for infants at the beach!
customer_reviews.text: This was a life saver at the beach when we didn’t want to put our 6 month old directly in the ocean, she could keep cool and play in the ocean water safely. Traveled well and very easy to inflate.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Jacobus

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically To bring to our family beach trip to be able to have a little paddle pool in the shade for my almost 2 year old and 4 year old. It worked perfectly. By the end of the week I think it had a small leak somewhere but it did it’s job and was a good price and perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of your money and time.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for this summer. Quality of the product is so bad it doesn’t hold the air I had to inflate it every time my daughter use. Finally it didn’t hold air anymore and it threw in garbage. I would never recommend this product to anyone. I think it’s waste of your money and time.
customer_reviews.author: jayden

customer_reviews.title: ... 13 month daughter and I am sure she'll have fun with it this summer
customer_reviews.text: The pool is the right size for my 13 month daughter and I am sure she'll have fun with it this summer. However, the pool is not as attractive as I thought it would be. There are warning labels printed across the entire yellow ring. The warning labels are photoshopped out of the picture used in the advertisement, which IMO is false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: J.G.

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I do really love this pool for my one year old. So easy to inflate and easy to store. I think I received a defective one though because the top ring doesn’t stay inflated. I would have returned or exchanged, but my son really loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Pohley

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun for baby, but...
customer_reviews.text: The bottom inner liner tore after its third time being used when our 9 year old grandson was dumping out the water. How? Not sure, but I think it indicates it's not built to last. It still holds water, but the bottom is flat now. Grand baby definitely still enjoys it. If it survives the rest of the summer, I'll give it another star.
customer_reviews.author: SFH

product_meta.title: Intex Sunset Glow Baby Pool (34 in x 10 in)
product_meta.description: Intex Sunset Glow Baby Pool (34 in x 10 in)
feature_bullets: Holds up to 22 gallons of water
Parental supervision required for smaller children

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars7,866 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
